comments: Really easy class as long as you pay attention. She gives study guides for the tests. The homework can be done like an hour to thirty minutes before class,but I mean you should probably do it the day she assigned it so that you don\'t have to worry about it later.

Professor Ray made this class very comfortable and it was indeed a refresher course for me as I am an older student and had not done research in a library in many years. Of course I was the oldest student in a class of Soar Students haha. Easy class just show up.

Great class for students just beginning college. Will teach you how to write a research paper in MLA format, which is needed for many, if not all of the classes students will take at AVC. Awesome information for conducting library research. Easy work, a couple journals, a bibliography, no paper!
really hard class. she dosent even tell you the answers during the test. y do u needz skool anyway!
Very good and teacher. Loved the class. She is Russian so you need to get used to her accent. Also good looking as well
hottest and easiest teacher i have ever had
She\'s really really easy! She gives you study guides for tests & everything you need to pass the course. If you get something wrong or don\'t understand something, she\'s always there to help you.
Very nice, easy class, gives you all the resources you need.
Awesome teacher. Made a boring subject very interesting. Would take her again if I got the chance. You RAWK!!!
